description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted to them by Kaya. The ship is currently navigating the East Blue waters while being pursued by Marine forces.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Surrounded by Nelson's Fleet
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry is completely encircled by Marine Branch 8's warships in the Crane Wing Formation, trapping the Straw Hat crew.
keyEvents.significance: The ship becomes the center of a major naval battle as the crew must defend it from bombardment.

keyEvents.title: Defended from Cannonball Barrage
keyEvents.description: Luffy protects the Going Merry from Nelson's cannon fire by deflecting cannonballs using his Gomu Gomu no Mi powers.
keyEvents.significance: The ship is saved from destruction through Luffy's quick thinking and Devil Fruit abilities.

statusHistory.reason: Currently serving as the Straw Hat Pirates' ship

description: One of the four Blues. The episode takes place in the open waters of the East Blue where Nelson's fleet confronts the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Naval Battle in East Blue Waters
keyEvents.description: A major naval confrontation occurs in the East Blue as Nelson's fleet surrounds and attacks the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: The location of the climactic battle of the Warship Island arc.

keyEvents.title: Eric's Betrayal Revealed at Sea
keyEvents.description: Eric reveals his treachery to Nelson while they are engaged in the naval battle.
keyEvents.significance: The open sea becomes the stage for Eric's betrayal and the subsequent chaos.

keyEvents.title: Ryu's Sacrifice Above the Sea
keyEvents.description: The ancient dragon Ryu makes his heroic sacrifice in the skies above the East Blue to protect Apis and the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: The sea and sky of East Blue witness the emotional climax of the arc.
